pullRequest.body:
Homomorphisms of bialgebras, mimicking the file `Mathlib.Algebra.Algebra.Hom`. 

---

Very similar to previous PR that added `Mathlib.RingTheory.Coalgebra.Hom`. Not sure about the notation, which is supposed to look like a combination of the coalgebra hom notation and the algebra hom notation.

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go

using the following format:

- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

Should this file just be exactly following the "best practices" laid out in [this module doc](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Data/FunLike/Basic.html)? Do you know what's going on when you diverge from this template? For example you don't seem to have made `copy` -- should you or doesn't this matter?
I've added `CoalgHom.copy` & `BialgHom.copy` now; I don't think anything else mentioned in the link is missing
